items.sentence: Tom always stays at school as late as the teachers allow him to.
I hope they don\'t resort to violence to accomplish their goals.
I just want to know why you didn\'t come over to help yesterday.
Tom couldn\'t get to the ski area because the roads were closed.
Tom doesn\'t want to spend more than $300 for a used motorcycle.
Tom says he\'ll pay back all the money he owes me before Monday.
I didn\'t know that the cost of living was so high in Australia.
This is the first time that I\'ve ever put out a fire with sand.
Tom is not the only one who thinks it\'s a good idea to do that.
Tom is quite determined to finish the report by 2:30, isn\'t he?
